experiences.description: Incident troubleshooting, categorization, and resolution, as well as documentation of discovered solutions. Adherence to internal and external KPI's.

Backlog incident categorisation and dispatch, production issue resolution, and production report generation, as well as automation and generalization of the most used reports using MS Power BI, Excel, and in-project tools (Service Now, Avaya, Amazon Connect, etc.)
Incident troubleshooting, categorization, and resolution, as well as documentation of discovered solutions. Adherence to internal and external KPI's.
Management, and publishing of content received from copy writers, and translators, as well as development of technical solutions for better management of content.
Resolving customer complaints, queries and questions.
Aftermarket support for a range of devices, such as satellite receivers, android units, etc.
Preparation of food, planning produce purchases, hygienic tasks.

Maintenance of client databases (MySQL, MSSQL) and development of backend systems; such as softphone integration (Avaya), automation of existing processes, and occasionally development of wholly new products.
Maintenance of existing products and systems, incident resolution, bug fixing of internal systems, and development of public-facing websites.
